title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Bilio, your AI finance coach for WhatsApp

contact.notFound: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
contact.supportMessage: Contact us on WhatsApp and we'll help you personally

questions.question: How does Bilio work?
questions.answer: Bilio is a WhatsApp bot that helps you track and categorize your expenses automatically. Simply send a message with your expense (e.g., 'Spent $20 on lunch') and Bilio will record it, categorize it, and help you track your finances.

questions.question: Is it safe to share my financial information?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Bilio uses end-to-end encryption and doesn't store sensitive information like bank account numbers. We only process expense data that you voluntarily choose to share to give you better reports.

questions.question: How much does Bilio cost?
questions.answer: Bilio has a free plan that includes unlimited expense tracking, automatic categorization, and basic reports. Our premium plan costs $4.99/month and includes advanced features like AI coaching, detailed reports, smart alerts, and priority support.

questions.question: Can I use Bilio for family budgeting?
questions.answer: Yes! Premium and business plans allow multiple users, perfect for families or teams who want to track their expenses and budgets together.

questions.question: What if I make a mistake with an expense?
questions.answer: You can easily correct any expense by sending a message to Bilio. For example: 'Correct yesterday's expense, it was $45 not $50'. The bot will automatically update your record.

questions.question: Can I export my data?
questions.answer: Yes, with premium plans you can export all your data in Excel and PDF formats for personal use or to share with your accountant.

questions.question: Is there a limit to how many expenses I can track?
questions.answer: No limits on any plan. You can track as many expenses as you need, without restrictions.

questions.question: Does Bilio work with US banks?
questions.answer: Currently, Bilio requires manual expense entry through WhatsApp. We're working on US bank integrations for future releases. The manual approach actually helps you stay more conscious of your spending.
